signals.problem_statement: The customer is struggling with the distribution of emails among team members using Gmail's shared inbox, which is not effective for their needs.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a system that allows appropriate delegation of emails.
signals.suggested_solution: A central command to see all emails and mark them as being worked on in real time.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: Emails are being duplicated across personal and shared inboxes, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.customer_ask: A solution to avoid duplicating work and manage emails more effectively.
signals.suggested_solution: A way to manage emails without them being forwarded to personal inboxes.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing household-related emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to track who is handling which emails to avoid confusion and ensure accountability.
signals.customer_ask: A system that shows who is working on what email.
signals.suggested_solution: Visibility into email assignments and the ability to reassign emails when necessary.
signals.context: Small team of 3-4 people managing household-related emails.
